document.full_text: nato will extend the length of its police training course across afghanistan from october as it takes aim at staggeringly low literacy rates and corruption among the force before all security is handed over to the afghans by the end of 2014.
document.title: nato beefs up afghan police training as 2014 looms
lines_and_colors: nato will extend the length of its police training course across afghanistan from october as it takes aim at staggeringly low literacy rates and corruption among the force before all security is handed over to the afghans by the end of 2014.
